ohuge sakshiye di heli wu thawath apuru karunak wuye maha bankuwe mulya kriyakarakam sidu kirime di eewayehi winiwida bawa thahawuru wanu pinisa wyawasthapitha niyamakota athi paridi mulya katayuthuwalata sambandhitha departhamenthu 04 ka pradhaningen samanwitha wu adhipathiwarayage pradhanathwayen yuthu kamituwak â€œmulya mandalayaâ€ washayen kriyathmaka wiya yuthu bawak, eheth arjuna mahendran mahatha paminimen pasu wasarakatath wada dirgha wu kala simawa thula mulya mandalaya ras wuye in samajikayan dedenakuma nomathiwa thidenakugen pamanak samanwithawa bawaya.

newil samarakon naduwedi therim sabhawa nishchaya kirima sandaha itha ihala mattame oppu kirime bharayak awashya wiya.esema newil samarakon naduwedi idiripath kala therim karaka sabha warthawe sandahan kara athi aakarayata wisamacharaya sambandhayen di athi nirwachanaya kamituwa wisin piligatha yuthu we.esema abhawapraptha kathanayaka garu anura bandaranayaka mathithuma wisin dena lada mayim galak wani thiranayehi mese satahan kara atha.â€œaluth wyawasthawan handunwadima ho shreshtadhikarana winishchayakarawarunta erehiwa doshabhiyoga yojana idiripath kirima sambandhayen ho pawathna sthawara niyoga sanshodhanaya kirima kerehi garu parlimenthu manthriwarun wisin thama awadhanaya yomu kirima manawi.â€kamituwe awadhanaya sandaha adala karagatha yuthu samahara karunu mehi we..

subhashini jayarathnausas pela prathipalawala gatalu sahagatha thaththwaya wimarshanaya kirimata janadhipathithuma wisin pathkala kamituwa; wibhaga gatalu awama kerena shri lankawata galapena nawa kramawedayak pilibandawa yojana idiripath kirimata sudanamin sitina bawa ema kamitu sabhapathini thakshana ha paryeshana amathyanshaye lekam dhara wijethilaka mahathmiya â€˜siluminaâ€™ta pawasuwaya.sathi dekak wani kalayakadi wimarshanayata lakwu me siddhiyata adala warthawa idiri sathiyedi mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithumata bara dimata niyamitha bawath mema warthawe wibhaga departhamenthuwe katayuthu purna prathisanwidhanayakata lak kirime yojana da athulath kara athayi wadiduratath pawasuwaya.me kamituwa usas pela kha lakunu labadima sandaha sakasu suthraye nirawadyathawa sambandha wimarshana katayuthu sidu kala atharakha lakunu sakasima sandaha dayaka wu widwath kamituwe samajikayan samanga da sakachcha kota thorathuru raskaragena atha.
ee damila sisuwiyak samuha dushanayakata lakwa ghathanaya wimayi.

dakunu aasiya kalapaye shri lankawa athithaye sathu karagena thibu malala krida aadhipathyaya yali godanagima sandaha dawantha meheyumak arambaa atha.ehi palamu piyawara lesa malala kridaka kridikawan rata wenuwen kala yuthu karyabharaya pahadili karana sammanthranayak heta(27) perawaru 9.30ta krida widyayathana shrawanagarayedi pawathwe.
ohu pawasa aththe palaka madiriya ese kiwa da thamanta adi 500k pamana ihalin ithamathma dipthimath kola pahathi aaloka hatharak wihiduwana wishala adbhutha yanayak gaman karamin sitina bawayi.
